stories.text:
My name is Peter. I've been programming for several years, but not yet professionally. I'm pretty good with Python & Django, and OK with Javascript, and I've done a lot of small/medium hobby projects. I'd like to get a job coding, but I'm not sure how to transition into a technical career. I'm a generalist for sure, and I'm pretty confident in my ability to code and solve problems, but I think I'm going about the career/job aspect the wrong way.

I'm open to different ideas, and I'd be glad to give back in whatever way I can to anyone who'd like to work with me.

You can check out most of my projects at github.com/lawsonpd, and just DM if you'd like to know more!

Cheers!
stories.title: Ask HN: Would anyone like to mentor an intermediate developer?
